NFT at Idlewild

Mar 8, 2009

Yesterday, Not For Tourists threw a party at Idlewild Books to celebrate a new partnership.  Idlewild will now be selling Not For Tourist neighborhood maps.  This bookstore is dangerous for travel addicts and itinerant spirits.  Books are organized by location, with guides, fiction, non-fiction, and cartography grouped together.  I spent much time salivating over the selection before turning my attention to the free wine and sociable urbanites that run Not For Tourists.  Congrats to everyone involved in the partnership.
